includedAssets.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
includedAssets.synopsis: When Neptune's crown is stolen, SpongeBob and Patrick set out to clear Mr Krabs' name. Absorbingly offbeat cartoon caper with a cameo from David Hasselhoff.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Neptune's crown is stolen, SpongeBob and Patrick must clear Mr Krabs' name. Absorbingly offbeat cartoon caper with a cameo from David Hasselhoff.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Neptune's crown is stolen, SpongeBob and Patrick set out to clear Mr Krabs' name. Absorbingly offbeat cartoon caper with a cameo from David Hasselhoff.

includedAssets.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
includedAssets.synopsis: When the secret recipe for Krabby Patties literally vanishes into thin air, the finger of guilt points at an unlikely alliance of Krusty Krab burger flipper Spongebob Squarepants and his old enemy Plankton. With their favourite fast food gone, the good folk of undersea hamlet Bikini Bottom are helpless as their home is reduced to a post-apocalyptic ruin. It's up to our water absorbent hero to travel back in time and discover their whereabouts of the missing formula. Splendidly surreal sequel.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: SpongeBob and the gang leap into action when a pirate steals the secret recipe for Krabby Patties. Family adventure with Antonio Banderas.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When the secret recipe for Krabby Patties literally vanishes into thin air, the finger of guilt points at an unlikely alliance of Krusty Krab burger flipper Spongebob Squarepants and his old enemy Plankton. With their favourite fast food gone, the good folk of undersea hamlet Bikini Bottom are helpless as their home is reduced to a post-apocalyptic ruin. It's up to our water absorbent hero to travel back in time and discover their whereabouts of the missing formula. Splendidly surreal sequel.

includedAssets.title: SpongeBob Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: SpongeBob and the gang go to extreme lengths to find Neptune's stolen crown and prove Mr Krabs' innocence, before springing into action once again to find the missing secret recipe for Krabby Patties. Surreal cartoon family fun with David Hasselhoff and Antonio Banderas.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: SpongeBob and the gang try to find Neptune's stolen crown and prove Mr Krabs' innocence, before searching for the missing Krabby Patties recipe.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: SpongeBob and the gang go to extreme lengths to find Neptune's stolen crown and prove Mr Krabs' innocence, before springing into action once again to find the missing secret recipe for Krabby Patties. Surreal cartoon family fun with David Hasselhoff and Antonio Banderas.

includedIn.title: SpongeBob
includedIn.synopsis: SpongeBob and the gang brave the world outside of Bikini Bottom to find Neptune's stolen crown and prove Mr Krabs' innocence, before springing into action once again when the secret recipe for Krabby Patties is stolen by a pirate.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: SpongeBob heads out to find Neptune's crown and prove Mr Krabs' innocence, before springing into action when the Krabby Patties recipe is stolen.
